tasks.title: Create repository skeleton
tasks.description: Initialize gsd-browser directory tree (src/, scripts/, tools/, docker/, docs/, tests/, config/) plus placeholder README and TEMPLATE_GUIDE referencing GSD_BROWSER_BLUEPRINT.md.

sessions.notes: Created directory tree and placeholder README/TEMPLATE_GUIDE.

tasks.title: Add boilerplate metadata files
tasks.description: Create .gitignore, .env.example, config/mcp-config-example.json, and docs placeholders (SETUP.md, TROUBLESHOOTING.md, UPDATING.md).

sessions.notes: Added .gitignore, .env.example, config template, and docs placeholders.

tasks.title: Configure Python project
tasks.description: Author pyproject.toml for src/ layout, include dependencies, formatting/lint tools, and define console script entry point `gsd-browser`.

sessions.notes: Created pyproject.toml with build metadata, deps, entry point, and tooling config.

tasks.title: Implement stub MCP server
tasks.description: Create src/gsd_browser package with __init__.py, cli.py exposing serve/diagnose/smoke commands, and main.py with placeholder stdio loop.

sessions.notes: Added __init__.py, Typer CLI with serve/diagnose/smoke, and placeholder stdio main loop.

tasks.title: Configuration system
tasks.description: Add config.py (dataclass/pydantic), implement env/CLI loading precedence, schema validation, and script to print MCP config snippet.

sessions.notes: Added pydantic Settings loader, wired CLI to load config, and created print-mcp-config script.

tasks.title: Local developer tooling scripts
tasks.description: Write scripts/run-local.sh, scripts/diagnose.sh, scripts/smoke-test.sh, and scripts/check-mcp-config.sh with portability improvements.

sessions.notes: Added run-local, diagnose, smoke-test, and check-mcp-config scripts with portability improvements.

tasks.title: pipx-focused installer suite
tasks.description: Implement tools/install.sh/upgrade.sh/uninstall.sh using pipx, manifest tracking, dependency checks, and cleanup routines.

sessions.notes: Created pipx install/upgrade/uninstall scripts with manifest tracking.

tasks.title: Docker packaging
tasks.description: Author docker/Dockerfile, docker/entrypoint.sh, and optional compose file mirroring claude-quickstarts pattern.

sessions.notes: Added Dockerfile, entrypoint, and compose configuration.

tasks.title: Diagnostics and automated tests
tasks.description: Create tests/smoke suite validating stdio handshake, CLI commands, and include Makefile/Taskfile targets to run lint/test/smoke.

sessions.notes: Added smoke pytest, CLI round-trip script integration, and Makefile targets for dev/lint/test/smoke/docker.

tasks.title: Documentation pass
tasks.description: Fill README, TEMPLATE_GUIDE, SETUP, TROUBLESHOOTING, and UPDATING docs with clear install/upgrade/uninstall/docker guidance.

sessions.notes: Expanded README, Template Guide, and docs (SETUP/TROUBLESHOOTING/UPDATING) with actionable instructions.
